name: Sad Droid (C64) Commodore 64
description:
An ongoing series of Commodore 64 games, puzzle, strategy, battle, text adventure and various files discovered along a greater virtual novel in a unique Commodore experience unlike any other presented before! Many more updates and addition to come.. Are you bold and courageous enough to join this project?

ALL GAMES AND FILES WILL BE UPLOADED AND UPDATED HERE. THIS IS AN ONGOING PROJECT, THUS MARKED IN-DEVELOPMENT, ALTHOUGH EACH GAME IS STANDALONE COMPLETE.

Game I: Sad Droid

- A command-line interface puzzle adventure. You are a droid model AS-5, newly activated on a desolate space station where the crew have mysteriously been terminated. Will you with reach the first step for robot-kind, and be able to continue your journey in the next chapter or perish along with the others?

- REQUIRES EITHER COMMODORE 64 EMULATOR (IE. THE FREE CROSS-PLATFORM VICE https://vice-emu.sourceforge.io/) OR A COMMODORE 64
- REQUIRES A KEYBOARD
